articles.title: Stiffed by Tesla: The car company owes small businesses millions in unpaid bills | CNN Politics
articles.description: Dozens of small businesses saw working with Musk’s companies as their big break. They say it left them in financial ruins. CNN’s Kyung Lah reports.
